1370: Marcibilia was born in Papenhofstede in 1370.
Got married to Gherelm at age 26 in 1370.
1371: Gave birth to Marcibilia in 1371 at age 27.
1372: Gave birth to Ghisele in 1372 at age 28.
1374: Gave birth to Douwen in 1374 at age 30.
1375: Gave birth to Clarebout in 1375 at age 31.
1377: Gave birth to Badeloghen in 1377 at age 33.
1380: Gave birth to Gerburgis in 1380 at age 36.
1384: Gave birth to Heillam in 1384 at age 40.
1389: Lost son Heillam when Heillam was 6 years old.
